rules_text:
Create X blue Shrine enchantment tokens named Unmarked Shrine with “At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent mills a card.”
{1}{U}, Exile Lost to Memory from your graveyard: Draw two cards. Activate only if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
notes: !script Spawn Shrine/spawn Unmarked Shrine TTRSpawn five Shrines/spawnx5 Unmarked Shrine TTR,r
